name: A Magical Harvest
description:
You have a minute to harvest as many magic shards as you can, putting shards in the collectors will add a small amount of time to the countdown.

  •  Harvest Shards from the collection points next to the fields.
  •  Put harvested shards into the collection points with no fields near them.

Controls

Move - WASD

Look - Mouse

Harvest from Field - Left Mouse Button

Place in collector - Right Mouse Button
